==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|そう|ぞう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/sauzau/}} → {{IPAchar|/sɔːzɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/soːzoː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=そうぞう}} {{m|zh|創造|tr= tsrhjang<sup>H </sup>  dzaw<sup>X </sup>|lit=to begin + to make}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|創造}} ''chuàngzào'', or {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''cong<sup>3</sup> zou<sup>6</sup>'', “creation, to create”.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|そうぞう|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|そうぞう|hhira=さうざう}}

# [[creation]]: the [[make|making]] of things
# [[Creation]]: all of [[existence]] as created by one or more [[deity|deities]]
